description: Sets the default encryption configuration for the Amazon Web Services account. For more information, see Key management in the IoT SiteWise User Guide.

parameters.name: encryptionType
parameters.description: The type of encryption used for the encryption configuration.

nested_items.name: encryptionType
nested_items.description: The type of encryption used for the encryption configuration.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Key ARN of the KMS key used for KMS encryption if you use KMS_BASED_ENCRYPTION.

nested_items.name: configurationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the account configuration. This contains the ConfigurationState. If there is an error, it also contains the ErrorDetails.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the configuration.
